/* Most CSS files are auto-generated from a corresponding .less file.
Rather than editing the CSS file,

 1. Edit the .less file in the less/ subdirectory. 
 2. Then run the LESS preprocessor to update the CSS file.

Any Less preprocessor can be used, but grunt-contrib-less automates the
conversion with a file called Gruntfile.js (like Makefile).

---------------------------------------------------------------
To install grunt-contrib-less, 

 1. Install Node.js from https://nodejs.org/en/download/
 2. From the project directory: npm install grunt-contrib-less --save-dev

Now you're ready to run "grunt less" from the project directory.


---------------------------------------------------------------
References:

See http://lesscss.org/features/ for LESS preprocessor syntax.

The file Gruntfile.js determines the correspondence between the .less file and
the .css file.
See http://gruntjs.com/configuring-tasks#building-the-files-object-dynamically

*/
